intro: Calonema horistes, commonly known as the silver lace fern, is a species of flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Asparagaceae and is characterized by its elegant, feathery fronds that resemble lace. Calonema horistes is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and ease of care.
